title: As a league econ user I want outrighted player's salary values to show up under LRD payroll as Minor League salary
custom_preconds:
Since 2017 we have shown outrighted player salary under the CBT payroll as minor league salary.

Users would now like to start showing that value on the LRD payroll as well.  They have asked that we retro fill this in starting with 2023 (and to continue showing it post 2023).

They have also asked that we provide them with the list of all 2023 contracts that will be updated as a result of this change.

title: Convert the affiliate utility to React
custom_preconds:
Convert the affiliate utility widget and profile screens to React.

Both screens should function the same as they do in AngularJs (ebisui)

title: As a MJC Admin, I want a soft error when asking OR Waivers on a XX(B) who signed a MNC First
custom_preconds:
Business Value: Rather than the current Hard Error that prevents Clubs from asking OR Waivers on a XX(B) Free Agent who signed a Minor League UPC prior to being selected to the Major League Roster, there will be a Soft Error to only warn them

AC:

* As a Club, navigate to the Waivers dashboard
* Select to Edit, and select a player on the Request Entry widget
* Select â€œORâ€� as the Type, and Save
* There will be a Soft Error message that pops up
** This will be in replacement of the Hard Error message

title: As a BOC User, I want to send a player memo via Text
custom_preconds:
AC:
 - When a player memo is sent, EBIS will send the memo to all players via Text using the MLB Official Contact Info
 - Deliveries and failures will be logged and available for download

title: Minor Rule # Change on MJC UPC Boilerplate
custom_preconds:
Please change the boilerplate to have the bolded reference change from Rule 18 to Rule 12, under section 8 of the Regulations.

----

Post-Season Exhibition Games. Major League Rule 12(b) provides:
 (b) EXHIBITION GAMES. No player shall participate in any exhibition game during the period between the close of the Major League championship season and the following training season, except that, with the consent of the playerâ€™s Club and permission of the Commissioner, a player may participate in exhibition games for a period of not less than 30 days, such period to be designated annually by the Commissioner. Players who participate in barnstorming during this period cannot engage in any Winter League activities.
 Player conduct, on and off the field, in connection with such post-season exhibition games shall be subject to the discipline of the Commissioner. The Commissioner shall not approve of more than three players of any one Club on the same team. The Commissioner shall not approve of more than three players from the joint membership of the World Series participants playing in the same game.
 No player shall participate in any exhibition game with or against any team which, during the current season or within one year, has had any ineligible player or which is or has been during the current season or within one year, managed and controlled by an ineligible player or by any person who has listed an ineligible player under an assumed name or who otherwise has violated, or attempted to violate, any exhibition game contract; or with or against any team which, during said season or within one year, has played against teams containing such ineligible players, or so managed or controlled. Any player who participates in such a game in violation of this *Rule 18* shall be fined not less than $50 nor more than $500, except that in no event shall such fine be less than the consideration received by such player for participating in such game.

title: Players Traded While On 60-Day IL Should Stay on Acquiring Club's 60-Day IL
custom_preconds:
Related to: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1846|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1846|smart-link] 

 Steps:

* Trade player on 60-Day IL to a new club with 3 days of Opening Day

Expected: Player remains on 60-Day IL with acquiring Club

Actual: Player is set to Not Yet Reports status

Rule needs to be update to not impact 60IL players

!image-20240329-204857.png|width=2034,height=842!

title: As a MNC Admin, I want Club Users to be prevented from submitting a MNC for a player with a Pre-Draft Physical that contains a signing bonus below $50K for a player draft in Rounds 11-20
custom_preconds:
Related to: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1285|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1285|smart-link] 



Business Value: If a player who has agreed to a pre-draft physical is drafted in rounds 1-10, the drafting club is required to offer 75% of slot to that player.  If a player who has agreed to a pre-draft physical is drafted in rounds 11-20, the drafting club is required to offer no less than $50,000 to that player.

AC:

* When a First-Year Domestic MNC is submitted, the system will perform a check to see if the player is has the Pre-Draft Physical flag set
* If the flag is set, and the player was drafted in rounds 1-10, the system will perform a check to confirm the Signing Bonus is at least 75% of the slot value for the pick the player was drafted with
* If the check fails, the system will return a hard error for club users and an overridable warning for BOC users:
** *Text*: This player completed a pre-draft physical and must have a signing bonus of at least 75% of slot.  Please contact the BOC.
** *Buttons*: Ignore & Continue (BOC Only), Back
* If the Pre-Draft Physical flag is set, and the player was drafted in rounds 11-20, the system will perform a check to confirm the Signing Bonus is >= $50,000
* If the check fails, the system will return a hard error for club users and an overridable warning for BOC users:
** *Text*: This player completed a pre-draft physical and must have a signing bonus of at least $50,000.  Please contact the BOC.
** *Buttons*: Ignore & Continue (BOC Only), Back

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see a new Advance Consent Widget in the Player Tracking screen on EBIS
custom_preconds:
Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3481502168/Data+Discovery+-+Advance+Consent+widget|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3481502168/Data+Discovery+-+Advance+Consent+widget|smart-link] 

AC:

* Navigate to the Player Tracking screen, under the Transactions dashboard
* There will be a new â€œAdvance Consentâ€� widget
* Widget will appear below the â€œWaivers in Effectâ€� widget
* This widget should pull from the new Advance Consent feature in the Service tab on Player Profiles to show all players with an Active Advance ConsentÂ 
* The widget will also show the number of days remaining from when the player signed
** This will be the signing date plus 45 days (46 days if signed prior or on Opening Day)
* When the days remaining countdown reaches zero, there will be a red exclamation point to the left of the player row - similar to the â€œCurrent DFA Playersâ€� widget (picture attached)
* Widget will be BOC Only

title: As a BOC User, I want to see a new "WBC" section added to the Email Utility on EBIS
custom_preconds:
Wireframe: [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#g=1&p=email_utility|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#g=1&p=email_utility|smart-link]  

AC:

* On the Email Utility, there will be a new â€œWBCâ€� section
* Both the Notification table and the Recipients section will have the following categories:
** WBC Requests
** Chronic Condition Updates
** Roster Updates
** Recently-Acquired Players
** MLB Club Medical Objections
** Player Interest
* The checkboxes will work as expected with regards to editing, saving, and permissions

title: As a UEC Admin, I don't want Clubs seeing each others UECs in the Contract History widget
custom_preconds:
AC:

* When a Club is viewing the Contract History widget on a profile, they will no longer see UECs that were signed with a different Club
* Example: When logged in as MIA and viewing Don Mattinglyâ€™s profile, the user will not see LAD or TOR UECs in the contract history.  That user will only see MIA UECs.

title: Update Logo Upload Sizes in EBIS
custom_preconds:
AC:

* When an affiliate profile is in edit mode, there will be text with instructions on uploading
* The note under the logo image be updated to read: â€œLogos must be uploaded at 750x750 as a .png on a transparent background. Please use the provided template for proper sizing and spacing.â€�
* There should be a validation in place to ensure the uploaded image is the correct size
* If the uploaded image is not 750x750, the system will return an error:
** Title: Error
Body:  The uploaded file is not the correct size.  Please upload an image that is 750x750
Buttons: Back

title: As a WLP Admin, I want a Date Filter added to the WLP Club Comm Screen in EBIS
custom_preconds:
Context: Currently, the WLP - Club Comm widget returns all reports ever created.  Users would like to export a smaller amount of reports.

AC:

* There will be a date range filter added to the header of the Reports widget on the WLP - Club Comm dashboard
* The beginning of the date range will default to Current Date - 6 Months
* The end of the date range will default to Current Date

title: CSP/CEP Login - Turn on Signal Sciences Blocking
custom_preconds: For the College Scholarship Plan & Continuing Education Program site, turn on Signal Sciences Blocking for added security
